attributes.action: Ban the use of horses in crowd control
attributes.additional_details:
The recent protests have shown horses are no effective at crowd control and are in fact a danger to themselves and others. 
Horses are a flight animal, no matter how well trained they will bolt under stress and cause injury.
attributes.background: Stop horses being used in crowd control by the uk police or others.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban the use of horses in the police force: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325179

Ban the use of horses for crowd control: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325275
